long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Achieve Better AI Answers 73% more often with Multiple Chatbots

I started ChatPlayground after finishing my research at UC Berkeley on which AI Model is the best.

I compared 10 AI chatbots including ChatGPT-4o, Gemini 1.5 Pro, Llama 3.2, Perplexity, Bing Copilot and, much more.

I found that each chatbots have their own perks, and that the only way to get the best response for your input is by using multiple chatbots at once ğŸ¤¯.

I used my own software to do this research but I had alot of demand to make it public, so ChatPlayground got started :)!

This is what I learned about each chatbot:

- ChatGPT-4o has really descriptive and usually longer answers, but prefers to answer in bullet points.

- ChatGPT-4o was able to generate really nice data tables, that Gemini 1.5 Pro wasn't able to ğŸ“Š.

- Gemini 1.5 pro is great because it feels like it understands the context of your question more by having a conversational tone ğŸ’¬.

- Perplexity is good at giving you a completely answer, most AI Chatbots will give you bullet point answers, perplexity prefers to write out a complete answer rather than just giving bullet points ğŸ“.

- Bing Copilot is great because it cites its resources, will even recommend videos to help you ğŸ“¹.

- Bing copilot can be great but 20-30% of the time the answers it gives are not even usable ğŸ˜.

- Because Bing copilot is using sources to give you answers the answers feel much more human like and at times more useful then other AI Chatbots that just list a bunch of basic bullet points ğŸ¤”.
